about_the_game:
This is a VR fighting game that pursues realistic fighting, allowing you to hold and open your hands in the game world using intuitive controller operations.

Dangerous techniques cause great damage, so
Simple, quick tricks can make the difference between winning and losing, giving you a thrilling experience.

In addition, in the mini-games, you can enjoy the game of avoiding flying objects, destroying targets, and earning points while making full use of the function of holding and opening your hands.

Virtual Real Fight is playable without body tracking, no Vive Trackers needed. If you have 2 Vive Trackers, you can kick, dodge and jump with your whole body.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Some Sexual Content（Revealing outfits),Frequent Violence, General Mature Content.
All the characters in this game have reached the age of 18.
